tech_news.description: The latest in the franchise is the most hyped release of 2026 and looks set to push the boundaries of gaming visuals – but it could prove more disturbing than entertaining.

tech_news.title: This Is the Blood Glucose Monitor We’ve Been Waiting For - WIRED
tech_news.description: Makers of smartwatches and other wearables have spent years trying to measure blood sugar without pricking your skin. The PreEvnt Issac does just that, and you wear it like a necklace.
